title: The Best Of  -{ In Search Of 1977 }+ Mysterious world
description:
UPDATE!!! I HAVE TO STOP THE SEED ON THIS TORRENT. THE HARD
DRIVE THAT HOLDS THE FILES IS MAKEING A BAD NOISE. DO NOT
DOWNLOAD TORRENT FILE. SORRY , THANKS.
-----------------------------------------------------------------


Before there was cable or satelite tv, the discovery ch science ch,
history ch There was only one place to see a program about mysterys 
and the paranormal-

IN SEARCH OF, with Leonard Nimoy 1977

This show being narrated by "SPOCK" gives a fun
valitidy to the subject matter. This show sets out
to prove not debunk. After the first episode I 
actualy believed that "Plants can think".

I call this torrent 'the best of' because these are
all the files that Have, 73 episodes all good ones
from season 1 through 6 this is a difficult show to find. 
Bigfoot,lake monsters, ufos, ghosts,esp, historical mysteries, 
there all here.

These episodes were recorded during its last tv
run on the history ch and are uncut with Nimoy.
The quality is " Not dvd rip" but watchable.
 
Because the series is not complete I'm including
Arthur C clarks Mysterious World as a bonus.These
are dvd rips.

Also a 70's documentry clasic about bigfoot hosted
by peter graves 'The mysterious monster'

My bandwith is limited,it will take a long time
for me to seed.Download episodes 1 or 2 at a time
in order so you can watch them. Otherwise it will
take 3 weeks or so.

Please help me get this torrent going. When you are
at 100% on all files seed untill some other people
finish.

Thank You for your help
TVS-DIVINE-LIGHT
